entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SDK 6.0.202 - Detected package downgrade during dotnet restore #24931
  • SDK tests end up modifying the SDK manifests #24923

Closed

  • [Preview] Unable to restore packages from feeds with encrypted passwords on windows #23498
  • With .NET 6.0.105, restoring project failed on Mariner 2.0 x64 #24875

PullRequests

Created

  • Try to lock the mono manifest file to figure out which tests are upda… #24932
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #24929
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Cache pipeline inputs when suppressed: #24928
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Switch updates to include for the targeted package references #24922
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0.4xx] Update branding to 6.0.400 #24921
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'main' #24917
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.2xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #24914
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • [release/6.0.3xx] Ensure stable property is set on asset manifest #24927
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.2xx' #24853
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'main' #24899
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Update Branding #24934
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update ubuntu version #24650
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add a fabricbot.json file to auto close issues with "Area-NuGet" label #24589
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Publish support in SDK for Native Aot Application #24693
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update the hardcoded net3.1 to the current framework #24900
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Feature band fallback with workload update #24678
    Area-Workloads
